mapper.select: SELECT room_id roomId, room_member roomMember, room_name roomName, member_cnt memberCnt, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM chat_room WHERE room_member = #{id} ORDER BY reg_dtime DESC

SELECT room_id roomId, room_member roomMember, room_name roomName, member_cnt memberCnt, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM chat_room WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND reg_id = #{regId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room ( room_id, room_member, room_name, member_cnt, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{roomMember}, #{roomName}, #{memberCnt}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{regId} )
INSERT INTO chat_message( room_id, writer, message, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{roomId}, #{writer}, #{message}, NOW(), NOW(), #{writer}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT message_no, room_id, writer, message, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND timestampDIFF(DAY, reg_dtime, NOW()) < 7
